main_definition: To provide visual representation or explanation using pictures, diagrams, or examples.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To give an example by showing images or drawings
meanings_and_examples.example: The children's book was illustrated with colorful and engaging illustrations that brought the story to life.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To provide visual aids in teaching or explaining something
meanings_and_examples.example: The teacher used several charts and diagrams to illustrate her lesson on human anatomy.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To depict or describe through illustrations
meanings_and_examples.example: The article was heavily illustrated with photographs of the endangered species it discussed.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To decorate or enhance a textual work with drawings, pictures, etc.
meanings_and_examples.example: The novel's success was partly due to its beautifully illustrated cover and illustrations inside.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To design visual representations for (a product) as part of the marketing process
meanings_and_examples.example: The company hired a professional designer to illustrate their new line of eco-friendly products.
